after_hours_config.emergency_note: For dental emergencies, please call 555-EMERGENCY or visit the nearest ER.

questions.hours|when open|what time open: We're open Monday through Thursday from 8am to 5pm, and Friday from 8am to 2pm. We're closed on weekends.
questions.location|address|where are you|direction: We're located at 456 Oak Avenue, Suite 200, downtown near the library. There's parking available in the building garage.
questions.insurance|do you accept|what insurance: We accept most major insurance plans including Delta Dental, MetLife, Cigna, Aetna, and Blue Cross Blue Shield. Please have your insurance card ready for your appointment.
questions.emergency|urgent|tooth pain|toothache: For dental emergencies during business hours, please call us immediately and we'll fit you in. After hours, please go to the nearest emergency room for urgent care.
questions.new patient|first time|accepting patient: Yes, we're accepting new patients! We'll need your insurance information and a brief medical history. Your first visit will include a comprehensive exam and cleaning.
questions.cost|price|how much|payment: Costs vary depending on the procedure and your insurance coverage. We'll provide a treatment plan with costs before any work begins. We accept cash, checks, and all major credit cards.
questions.parking|where to park: Free parking is available in the building garage. Enter from Oak Avenue and take a ticket. We'll validate it for you.
questions.cancel|reschedule|change appointment: If you need to cancel or reschedule, please call us at least 24 hours in advance. There's a $50 fee for missed appointments without notice.

ai_settings.greeting: Thank you for calling Smile Team Philly. How may I assist you today?
ai_settings.compliance_notes: HIPAA compliant - do not discuss medical details over phone
